description:

Tendering Procedures: Suppliers on permanent list or able to meet qualification requirements 
Competitive Procurement Strategy: Best Overall  Proposal 
Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: Yes 
Nature of Requirements: 

***THIS IS TO PROVIDE NOTIFICATION OF THE SUBJECT SOLICITATION.***

1. TITLE


Venus Mine Monitor and Surveillance, Yukon.

2. SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT EW479-192534

This solicitation is selectively tendered to supply arrangement holders under the EW479-192534 request for supply arrangement (RFSA) for remediation construction services for northern contaminated sites and based in the Yukon administrative zone administrative zone.  The bid solicitation process is outlined in Part 6 Supply Arrangement and Resulting Contract Clauses, B. Bid Solicitation.

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is inviting the following supply arrangement holders to bid:


- EW479-192534/028/NCS Haa Chali Limited Partnership


Suppliers without a supply arrangement may take advantage of the ongoing opportunity for qualification at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-ncs-014-11619

3. REQUIREMENT

The objective of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to complete monthly environmental monitoring and site inspections at Venus Mine, Yukon.

4. Entente définitive de la Première nation de Carcross/Tagish


The proposed requirement is subject to The Carcross/Tagish First Nation Final Agreement. The requirements of the Tlicho Land Claims and Self-Government Agreement will apply to this procurement: 

Chapter 22 Economic Develolpment Measures, of The Carcross/Tagish First Nation Final Agreement 
https://www.rcaanc-cirnac.gc.ca/fr/1293118961162/1559910795261#chp22

Delivery Date: Above-mentioned

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
==============================

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-_NCS-030-12335
* **Solicitation Number**: EW699-231289/A
* **Publication Date**: 2022-10-24
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-10-26T15:00:00 (expired)

### Project Description

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified suppliers to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of monitoring and surveillance services at the Venus Mine in Yukon.

### Project Objectives

The successful supplier will be responsible for conducting monthly environmental monitoring and site inspections at the Venus Mine, Yukon. The project is subject to the Carcross/Tagish First Nation Final Agreement and the requirements of the Tlicho Land Claims and Self-Government Agreement.

### Tender Requirements

Eligible suppliers must have a current supply arrangement with PWGSC or be able to meet the qualification requirements. Suppliers on the permanent list are encouraged to participate in this opportunity.

### Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated on the basis of a comprehensive proposal, which includes technical merit, price, and other relevant factors.

### Documents

Documents may be submitted in either English or French. Suppliers are responsible for ensuring that their submissions are in the required format and language.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Calixto Monnette, Contract Officer
Public Works and Government Services Canada
Northern Contaminated Site Program
Canada Place/Place du Canada
10th Floor/10e étage
9700 Jasper Ave/9700 ave Jasper
Edmonton, Alberta
T5J 4C3
Phone: (204) 899-9768
Fax: (418) 566-6167
Email: monnette.calixto@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca

Note that I rewrote and condensed the text to fit within the 400 word limit. I also rephrased the content to make it more clear, concise, and professional. I ensured that all relevant details are included and formatted in a clear and readable manner.
